definition: lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence

sentences.english: Directly he uttered these words there was a dead silence.
sentences.chinese: 當他直接說出這些話時，下面鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: Inside the hall, the owner again becomes utter muffle.
sentences.chinese: 大廳內，所有人再次變得鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: Back on the road, it was dead silent in the car.
sentences.chinese: 回來的路上，車廂內鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: Until eventually the whole courtroom was silent.
sentences.chinese: 最後，整個審判室鴉雀無聲了。
突然一切都變得鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: The guests watched and winced in absolute silence.
sentences.chinese: 客人們看着事情的發展，搖頭嘆氣，鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: The conductor enters, takes a bow, and all is silent.
sentences.chinese: 指揮上臺，鞠了一個躬，頓時全場鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: Is absolute silence, for a long time and for a long time, the this northern ground is all quietness.
sentences.chinese: 鴉雀無聲，許久許久，這趙地之北都是靜悄悄的。

sentences.english: Everybody's doing very co-operative movement, suddenly silenced an entire classroom.
sentences.chinese: 大家很合作的做着動作，整個教室頓時鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: They were awed into silence by the sternness of her voice.
sentences.chinese: 她嚴厲的聲音把他們嚇得鴉雀無聲了。

sentences.english: The conductor turned to face her audience and the entire concert hall fell silent.
sentences.chinese: 指揮轉身面對觀衆，整個音樂廳頓時鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: Is utter silence, for a long time and for a long time, the this northern ground is all quietness.
sentences.chinese: 鴉雀無聲，許久許久，這趙地之北都是靜悄悄的。

sentences.english: Around the silent, usually familiar with the house an extra strangeness.
sentences.chinese: 周圍鴉雀無聲，平常熟悉的房子多了一種陌生感。

sentences.english: In the skin-flick theaters, audiences were silent.
sentences.chinese: 在放映黃色影片的電影院裏，觀衆們都鴉雀無聲。

sentences.english: Even more odd, the street was filled by an unbroken silence.
sentences.chinese: 甚至更爲蹊蹺的是，這條街道鴉雀無聲，寂靜異常。

sentences.english: The audience immediately went into complete silence and listened attentively.
sentences.chinese: 頓時臺下鴉雀無聲，聽衆凝神聆聽。

definition: lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
after the calamity, renewed life (idiom); new lease of life
